name: plugin-system
description: Library to help loading plugins from different locations

scripts.lint: node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint index.js test && node_modules/jscs/bin/jscs -c test/.jscsrc test && node_modules/jscs/bin/jscs -c .jscsrc index.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test
scripts.push: git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Olivier Ory
